As for the object being already eliminated and the substance already eliminated, it refers to those who have already abandoned craving for the form realm but not yet abandoned craving for the formless realm, and the wholesome minds bound to the form realm that take the desire realm and formless realm as objects, take the form realm and formless realm as objects, and take the desire realm, form realm, and formless realm as objects.
This is called the object being already eliminated and the substance already eliminated.

As for the object being already eliminated and the substance not yet eliminated, it refers to those who have already abandoned craving for the desire realm but not yet abandoned craving for the form realm, and the wholesome minds bound to the form realm that take the desire realm and form realm as objects, take the desire realm and formless realm as objects, and take the desire realm, form realm, and formless realm as objects.

Before abandoning craving for the form realm, when the cognition of the class of suffering has arisen but the cognition of the class of accumulation has not yet arisen, the wholesome minds bound to the form realm take the cessation of suffering and the path as objects, and take the objects to be eliminated by seeing the truth of accumulation and the truth of the path, as well as those to be eliminated by cultivation, as objects.

When the cognition of the class of accumulation has already arisen and the cognition of the class of cessation has not yet arisen, all wholesome minds associated with the form realm take as their object the path to be eliminated by seeing the truths of suffering, accumulation, cessation, and the path, as well as that to be eliminated by cultivation.

When the cognition of the class of cessation has already arisen and the cognition of the class of the path has not yet arisen, all wholesome minds associated with the form realm take as their object the path to be eliminated by seeing the truths of suffering, accumulation, cessation, and the path, as well as that to be eliminated by cultivation.

If one who has perfected insight, a disciple of the World-Honored One, has not yet eliminated craving for the form realm, all wholesome minds associated with the form realm take as their object that to be eliminated by seeing and cultivation.
This is called that which has already been eliminated as an object and that which has not yet been eliminated as an object, but whose substance has not yet been eliminated.
If the substance of a wholesome mind associated with the form realm that is to be eliminated by cultivation has already been eliminated, has its object also already been eliminated?

Either the substance has already been eliminated and the object has already been eliminated, or the substance has already been eliminated but the object has not yet been eliminated, or the substance has already been eliminated and both the object that has already been eliminated and the object that has not yet been eliminated, or the substance has already been eliminated but one cannot discriminate whether the object has already been eliminated or not.

As for the essence having already been eliminated and the object-support having already been eliminated, this refers to when one has not yet separated from desire for the form realm, the cognition of the class of suffering has already arisen, and the cognition of the class of accumulation has not yet arisen. All form-realm-connected obscured indeterminate minds that are eliminated by the path of seeing suffering take as their object that which is eliminated by the path of seeing suffering.

When the cognition of the class of accumulation has already arisen and the cognition of the class of cessation has not yet arisen, all form-realm-connected obscured indeterminate minds that are eliminated by the path of seeing suffering and the path of seeing accumulation take as their object that which is eliminated by the path of seeing suffering and the path of seeing accumulation.
An obscured indeterminate mind eliminated by the path of seeing suffering takes as its object that which is eliminated by the path of seeing suffering.
An obscured indeterminate mind eliminated by the path of seeing accumulation takes as its object that which is eliminated by the path of seeing accumulation.

When the cognition of the class of cessation has already arisen and the cognition of the class of the path has not yet arisen, all form-realm-connected obscured indeterminate minds that are eliminated by the path of seeing suffering and the path of seeing accumulation take as their object that which is eliminated by the path of seeing suffering, the path of seeing accumulation, and the path of seeing cessation.
An obscured indeterminate mind eliminated by the path of seeing suffering takes as its object that which is eliminated by the path of seeing suffering.
An obscured indeterminate mind eliminated by the path of seeing accumulation takes as its object that which is eliminated by the path of seeing accumulation.
A defiled and indeterminate mind eliminated by the path of insight into cessation takes the objects eliminated by the path of insight into cessation as its object.

If a perfected one whose insight is complete, a disciple of the World-Honored One who has not yet eliminated craving for the form realm, a defiled and indeterminate mind bound to the form realm eliminated by the path of insight takes the objects eliminated by the path of insight as its object.

Having already eliminated craving for the form realm but not yet eliminated craving for the formless realm, a defiled and indeterminate mind bound to the form realm takes objects bound to the form realm as its object.

Having already eliminated craving for the formless realm, a defiled and indeterminate mind bound to the form realm takes objects bound to the form realm, objects bound to the formless realm, and objects bound to both the form and formless realms as its object.
This is called the substance has already been eliminated and the object has also been eliminated.

As for the substance has already been eliminated but the object has not been eliminated, it refers to one who has not yet eliminated craving for the form realm, for whom the cognition of the class of suffering has arisen but the cognition of the class of accumulation has not yet arisen, and a defiled and indeterminate mind bound to the form realm eliminated by the path of insight into suffering takes the objects eliminated by the path of insight into accumulation, cessation, and the path, as well as those eliminated by cultivation, as its object.

When the cognition of the class of accumulation has already arisen and the cognition of the class of cessation has not yet arisen, all obscured indeterminate minds associated with the form realm that are to be eliminated by seeing the truths of suffering and accumulation take as their objects the cessation and path that are to be eliminated by seeing, as well as that which is to be eliminated by cultivation.

When the cognition of the class of cessation has already arisen and the cognition of the class of the path has not yet arisen, all obscured indeterminate minds associated with the form realm that are to be eliminated by seeing the truths of suffering and accumulation take as their objects the path that is to be eliminated by seeing, as well as that which is to be eliminated by cultivation.

If one has perfected insight and is a disciple of the World-Honored One, but has not yet eliminated craving for the form realm, all obscured indeterminate minds associated with the form realm that are to be eliminated by seeing take as their objects that which is to be eliminated by cultivation.

Having already eliminated craving for the form realm, but before the cognition of the class of suffering has arisen, all obscured indeterminate minds associated with the form realm take as their objects that which is associated with the formless realm.
This is called the substance has already been eliminated but the object has not yet been eliminated.

As for the essence that has already been eliminated and the object that has already been eliminated and the object that has not yet been eliminated, it refers to those who have not yet separated from desire of the form realm, for whom the cognition of the class of suffering has already arisen but the cognition of the class of accumulation has not yet arisen, all form-realm-connected obscured indeterminate minds eliminated by the path of insight into suffering, taking as object the class of suffering, accumulation, cessation, and the path of insight, and that eliminated by cultivation.

For those for whom the cognition of the class of accumulation has already arisen but the cognition of the class of cessation has not yet arisen, all form-realm-connected obscured indeterminate minds eliminated by the path of insight into suffering and accumulation, taking as object the class of suffering, accumulation, cessation, and the path of insight, and that eliminated by cultivation.

For those for whom the cognition of the class of cessation has already arisen but the cognition of the class of the path has not yet arisen, all form-realm-connected obscured indeterminate minds eliminated by the path of insight into suffering and accumulation, taking as object the class of suffering, accumulation, cessation, and the path of insight, and that eliminated by cultivation.

If one's insight is complete, and the World-Honored One's disciples have not yet separated from desire of the form realm, all form-realm-connected obscured indeterminate minds eliminated by the path of insight, taking as object that eliminated by the path of insight and that eliminated by the path of cultivation.

Those who have already abandoned craving for the form realm but have not yet abandoned craving for the formless realm, all form-realm-connected obscured indeterminate minds take form-realm-connected and formless-realm-connected [dharmas] as objects.
This is called the substance has already been eliminated and the object has already been eliminated, as well as the object has not yet been eliminated.

As for the substance having already been eliminated, it cannot be distinguished whether this mind's object has already been eliminated or not yet been eliminated. Either the object has already been eliminated and its essence has already been eliminated, or the object has already been eliminated but its essence has not yet been eliminated, or the object has already been eliminated and the object not yet eliminated and its essence has already been eliminated, or the object has already been eliminated and the object not yet eliminated and its essence has not yet been eliminated.

The object has already been eliminated and its essence has already been eliminated refers to those who have not yet eliminated desire for the form realm, for whom the cognition of the class of suffering has already arisen but the cognition of the class of accumulation has not yet arisen, and the obscured indeterminate mind associated with the form realm that is eliminated by the path of seeing suffering, takes as its object that which is eliminated by the path of seeing suffering.

For those for whom the cognition of the class of accumulation has already arisen but the cognition of the class of cessation has not yet arisen, the obscured indeterminate mind associated with the form realm that is eliminated by the path of seeing suffering and the path of seeing accumulation, takes as its object that which is eliminated by the path of seeing suffering and the path of seeing accumulation.
The obscured indeterminate mind eliminated by the path of seeing suffering takes as its object that which is eliminated by the path of seeing suffering.

When the cognition of the class of cessation has arisen but the cognition of the class of the path has not yet arisen, the obscured-neutral mind of the realm of form eliminated by the path of seeing the origin and the path of seeing the cessation [of suffering] takes the eliminated by the path of seeing the origin and the path of seeing the cessation as its object.
The obscured-neutral mind eliminated by the path of seeing suffering takes the eliminated by the path of seeing suffering as its object.

Having already eliminated craving for the realm of form but not yet eliminated craving for the formless realm, the obscured-neutral mind of the realm of form takes the realm of form as its object.

When one has already abandoned craving for the formless realm, all obscured indeterminate minds associated with the form realm, taking form as their object, taking the formless realm as their object, taking both the form realm and the formless realm as their object.

As for the object has already been eliminated but its substance has not yet been eliminated, it refers to those who have not yet abandoned craving for the form realm, for whom the cognition of the class of suffering has already arisen but the cognition of the class of accumulation has not yet arisen, all obscured indeterminate minds associated with the form realm that are eliminated by seeing the accumulation, taking as their object what is eliminated by seeing the class of suffering.
This is called the object has already been eliminated but its substance has not yet been eliminated.

As for the object has already been eliminated and the object has not yet been eliminated, and its substance has already been eliminated, it refers to those who have not yet abandoned craving for the form realm, for whom the cognition of the class of suffering has already arisen but the cognition of the class of accumulation has not yet arisen, all obscured indeterminate minds associated with the form realm that are eliminated by seeing the class of suffering, taking as their object the cessation and path of seeing the class of suffering and accumulation, and what is eliminated by cultivation.

When the cognition of the class of accumulation has already arisen and the cognition of the class of cessation has not yet arisen, all obscured indeterminate minds associated with the form realm that are to be eliminated by seeing the truths of suffering and accumulation take as their objects the truths of suffering, accumulation, cessation, and the path, as well as that which is to be eliminated by cultivation.

When the cognition of the class of cessation has already arisen and the cognition of the class of the path has not yet arisen, all obscured indeterminate minds associated with the form realm that are to be eliminated by seeing the truths of suffering and accumulation take as their objects the truths of suffering, accumulation, cessation, and the path, as well as that which is to be eliminated by cultivation.

As for the form-realm-bound non-obscured indeterminate minds, if the substance has already been eliminated, has the object also already been eliminated?
He said:
It is like this.
If the object has already been eliminated, has the substance also already been eliminated?

Either the object has already been eliminated and the substance has already been eliminated, or the object has already been eliminated but the substance has not yet been eliminated, or the object has already been eliminated and the substance has not yet been eliminated.

As for the object has already been eliminated and the substance has already been eliminated, it refers to those who have already abandoned desire for the form realm but have not yet abandoned desire for the formless realm, and all the form-realm-bound non-obscured indeterminate minds, taking as their object the desire realm-bound and form realm-bound.
